EmailTemplate.name: 10-03-2022 RET Freshop ABM Campaign Southeastern Grocers Email 4.Email 4
EmailTemplate.subject: Built FOR Grocers, BY Grocers – NCR Freshop is Ready for Southeastern Grocers
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Don’t lose visibility into your customer experience with a lackluster eCommerce site that places your logo side by side with your competitors. Keep it simple for your customers. Keep your margins in your pocket. And don’t overspend on your eCommerce solution. It’s time to adopt the eCommerce solution that enables you to take full ownership of your customer experience—and slim down the amount of vendors you have to juggle to deliver a connected physical and digital experience for your loyal customers at Southeastern Grocers. Let us help take Southeastern Grocers’ online grocery shopping to the next level with the eCommerce solution built for grocers, by grocers. That’s NCR Freshop. We look forward to hosting you for a demo! ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Got questions? Contact us. <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
